items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he had to leave before 2:30.
Tom told Mary that she should be nicer to John.
Tom told Mary that she should visit the museum.
Tom told Mary that their relationship was over.
Tom tried to persuade Mary to sell him her car.
Tom usually sleeps in on Saturdays and Sundays.
Tom blocked Mary\'s punch and kicked her again.
Tom is the most intelligent guy I\'ve ever met.
Tom is the new owner of Chuck\'s Bar and Grill.
Tom is the one responsible for this, isn\'t he?
